Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), catkin <!nocheck>, cmake <!nocheck>, dh-sequence-python3, python3-all, python3-catkin-pkg, python3-osrf-pycommon, python3-pytest <!nocheck>, python3-setuptools, python3-yaml
Description: Command line tools for catkin workspaces This package is part of ROS, the Robot Operating System. The catkin tools provide functionality to work with the catkin meta buildsystem and catkin workspaces, similar to the way the colcon tools support working with ROS 2 ament packages. . The catkin tools provide a convenient interface to build and test multiple packages in a catkin workspace, resolving all inter-dependencies and isolating the builds from each other.
